text: Palli Karma Sahayak Foundation or PKSF is a financial institution founded by the Government of Bangladesh to finance rural development and provide training and is located in Dhaka, Bangladesh. Dr Qazi Kholiquzzaman Ahmad is the Chairman of Palli Karma Sahayak Foundation. It is the umbrella body for micro credit in Bangladesh. ==History== Palli Karma Sahayak Foundation was established on 1990 by the government of Bangladesh. The organisation provides loan to Non-governmental organization that provide micro-credit services. The foundation Nawab Ali Chowdhury National Award in 2012 for poverty alleviation. The foundation as of 2017 has 8 million micro borrowers. The foundation is the largest agency for development in rural Bangladesh. ==References== Category:1990 establishments in Bangladesh Category:Finance in Bangladesh Category:Organisations based in Dhaka Category:Rural development in Bangladesh
